title: Give Aatrox 33% healing from minions.
body:
Taking it away entirely was a bit of a stretch.

Or alternatively, give him the full healing, but only in the Sweet Spot of his Q. That way he has to use the Q to heal if he wants lane sustain. 

Either way, he needs something to somewhat compensate taking away two of his strengths. 
*****

Edit: More options I thought of.

* Allow him to use his E again in a row if he attacks a champion during its AD steroid duration. 
* Buff the damage of his Q outside of the sweet spot.
* Boost his healing or damage against targets chained with his W. 

So many things that could be done besides just flat reverting the changes. And I mean just one of them. Obviously not all of them.

But yeah, I think so. Of course, there are plenty of other options. Increase the damage of his Q outside of the sweet spot, maybe even give him a second E if he attacks a champion within the duration for its AD boost.
